forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
The early hours in Downtown San Francisco reveal a soft cloak of clouds settling over the city, evoking a tranquil, muted charm as the temperature softly rests in the vicinity of 50 degrees. The westerly winds whisper gently, carrying the salty breath of the Pacific. As dawn unfolds, it seems the day will predominantly wear a shroud of gray, with highs reaching only into the mid-fifties before retreating slightly as the afternoon approaches, ushered along by gusts that dance briskly between 7 to 18 mph.

Although the fog may cocoon certain vistas, casting a dreamy haze, it does not entirely obscure the vibrancy of the city. One might find this a gentle invitation to don a light sweater or layer for warmth, perhaps opting for a comfortable scarf against the cool gusts. In these conditions, a wander through the quiet streets or a leisurely coffee at a cozy café could offer solace. With the mist playing against the backdrop of familiar landmarks, even a stroll by the waterfront can present a moody, contemplative atmosphere. The haze may temper the vibrancy of the day, but it certainly augments the rich texture of the San Francisco experience.
